TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CLSCompliantAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CLSCompliantAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CLSCompliantAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示程序元素是否符合公共语言规范 (CLS)。

span.span: Indicates whether a program element is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性用于指示特定的程序元素是否符合与公共语言规范 (CLS)，它定义任何面向.NET Framework 的语言必须支持的功能。The attribute is used to indicate whether a particular program element complies with the Common Language Specification (CLS), which defines the features that any language that targets the .NET Framework must support. CLS 遵从性主要是问题的考虑对库开发人员想要确保其库是问题的可在面向.NET Framework 的任何语言中访问。CLS compliance is primarily of concern to library developers who want to ensure that their libraries are accessible in any language that targets the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[语言独立性和独立于语言的组件](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md)。For more information, See [Language Independence and Language-Independent Components](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md). 你可以将应用属性设为以下程序元素： 程序集、 模块、 类、 结构、 枚举、 构造函数、 方法、 属性、 字段、 事件、 接口、 委托、 参数和返回值。You can apply the attribute to the following program elements: assembly, module, class, struct, enum, constructor, method, property, field, event, interface, delegate, parameter, and return value. 但是，CLS 遵从性的概念才有意义的程序集、 模块、 类型和成员的类型，不包括一个的成员签名的一部分。However, the notion of CLS compliance is only meaningful for assemblies, modules, types, and members of types, not parts of a member signature. 因此，时应用于参数或返回程序元素的值，将忽略。Consequently, is ignored when applied to parameter or return value program elements. 如果没有应用到的程序元素，则默认情况下：If no is applied to a program element, then by default: - 不符合 cls 的程序集。The assembly is not CLS-compliant. - 仅当其封闭类型或程序集为符合 cls 的类型符合 CLS。The type is CLS-compliant only if its enclosing type or assembly is CLS-compliant. - 仅当类型为符合 CLS，是符合 cls 的类型的成员。The member of a type is CLS-compliant only if the type is CLS-compliant. 如果程序集标记为符合 cls 的不符合 CLS 的程序集中任何公开的类型都必须标记为使用`false`自变量。If an assembly is marked as CLS-compliant, any publicly exposed type in the assembly that is not CLS-compliant must be marked with using a `false` argument. 同样，如果一个类标记为符合 CLS，你必须将逐个标记所有不符合 CLS 的成员。Similarly, if a class is marked as CLS-compliant, you must individually mark all members that are not CLS-compliant. 所有不符合的成员必须提供相应的 cls 的替代项。All non-compliant members must provide corresponding CLS-compliant alternatives. 应用于程序集或模块的属性必须出现在 C# 后`using`(`Imports`在 Visual Basic 中) 子句和代码之前。Attributes that are applied to assemblies or modules must occur after the C# `using` (`Imports` in Visual Basic) clauses and before the code. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 当前的 Microsoft Visual Basic 编译器有意不生成 CLS 遵从性警告，但是，将来的版本的编译器会发出该警告。The current Microsoft Visual Basic compiler intentionally does not generate a CLS-compliance warning, however, a future release of the compiler will issue that warning. ## Examples 下面的示例应用对整个程序集。The following example applies a to the entire assembly. ``` using System; [assembly: CLSCompliant(true)] ``` 以下声明将生成 CLS 遵从性警告，因为类型`UInt32`CLS 中未指定。The following declaration generates a CLS-compliance warning because the type `UInt32` is not specified in the CLS. ``` public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ``` 如果使用标记声明，不生成任何编译器警告或错误。If the declaration is marked with a , no compiler warning or error is generated. ``` [CLSCompliant(false)] public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ```

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with a Boolean value indicating whether the indicated program element is CLS-compliant.

span.span: Gets the Boolean value indicating whether the indicated program element is CLS-compliant.
